response.overview: The film tells the story of Daoji looking for the Bodhisattva all the way, but due to mispositioning, he found that the Bodhisattva turned into aTeenage Taoist nun Cihang. Daoji followed Cihang to protect Cihang, and finally turned Cihang into a Bodhisattva. The nine-tailed fox fainted in the desert in order to find the method of Zhong Kui's rebirth and was rescued by Ao Dingding. Ao Dingding gathered eight divine resurrection bells.
response.title: Demon Catcher Alliance 2
